column2: ENGLISH
As the new Emperor of Nilfgaard you enjoy the trust of your vassals, and many believe that under your rule the Empire will reach new heights.
Long live the Emperor!
Although you are the new Emperor of Nilfgaard, nobles an peasants alike see you unworthy of throne.
Long live the Emperor?
The Nilfgaard Empire have had different rulers - good and bad. Both the nobles and common folk see you as one of the best.
Perfect.
Just recently you was seen as one of the greatest Emperors Nilfgaard have ever had, but now for some reason not anymore.
What a loss for the Empire!

[Root.Liege.GetTitledName], the so called [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] is unworthy of the crown, [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] rule is slowly bringing the glorious Nilfgaardian Empire to ruin, anyone else would be better on the throne...
...even me!
[Root.Liege.GetTitledName], the current [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] is unworthy of the crown, [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] is bringing the Nilfgaardian Empire and our dynasty to ruin.
I am more worthy candidate to throne.
[Root.Liege.GetTitledName], the current [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] is unworthy of the crown. Under [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] rule my claim to the throne will be seen in better light.
A perfect chance.
The Nilfgaardian Empire Invades

The Nilfgaardian Empire has long been eyeing the North for a chance to continue their aggressive expansion even further. It seems like they have seen a chance and have declared war making you their next target.
There is no chance.
The North will face this threat together.
Call in war against the Nilfgaard Empire
Offer white peace
I will never yield.

To [Root.GetTitledName],

having no wish to come in armed conflict against the might of Nilfgaard Empire, I have decided that best course of action to avoid needless casualities, is to swear vassalage to Nilfgaard Empire.

 Sincerely [From.GetBestName]
Excelent!

[Root.GetTitledName],

I ask your assistance against the threat Nilfgaard poses to the North.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
Nilfgaard is a threat that must be stopped!
I can only lend financial support.
Regretfully I can't assist in this war!
I have enough wars on my own, I don't need even more.

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

after hearing your request I will help you. Although it's impossible for me to join your war, I will assist you financially.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
I'll take any help I can get

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

with deep regret I must inform you that I can't assist you in this war.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
Damn!

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

with deep regret I must inform you that I can't assist you in this war due to being involved in personal wars.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
Damn!

[Root.GetTitledName],

as you may know Nilfgaard has declared war me and you know [FromFrom.GetTitledName] won't be satisfied with just my lands, as such I propose to put our differences aside for now and face Nilfgaard together.

Signed [From.GetTitledName]
Victorious Once More

The Nilfgaardian Empire has once more proved to be superior. In addition to sizable land gains we have also rightfully gained the Kingdom of [From.Kingdom.GetBaseName]. Now the question is what to do with this title...
I will keep the title for myself.
I will grant it to someone worthy.
I have no need for the title.

[From.GetTitledName], the new owner of [FromFromFrom.Kingdom.GetBaseName], has decided to elevate you above the other lords of [FromFromFrom.Kingdom.GetBaseName] and entrust these land to your care, provided you serve [From.GetHerHim] faitfully.
Such honor...
My Liege, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], has decreed that henceforth I am a vassal of [From.GetTitledName]'s.
Very well.
